Introduction

Lee Seon Woong, also known for his stage name Tablo, is the leader and face of the trio Epik High. Aside from being a rapper and a vocalist, Tablo is also a producer.

In 2009, Tablo married Actress Kang Hye Jung and they had a daughter named Haru on 2010. Tablo also appeared in the reality show "Superman Returns" with Haru.
